title: What are some ways to advertise Ruqqus?

body: I guess advertising in communities you're already a part of would help, like different Discord servers or perhaps game forums or clan chats etc
body_html: I guess advertising in communities you're already a part of would help, like different Discord servers or perhaps game forums or clan chats etc

post.title: What are some ways to advertise Ruqqus?

body:
I think the best way to do it would be through word of mouth, that's how most things get popular really. Start by telling your friends about it and if they enjoy it they'll probably go tell other friends etc... 

I think Ruqqus is bound to grow through word of mouth and you already see the growth happening, heck we just hit 40k users ! Thats totally insane !
body_html:
I think the best way to do it would be through word of mouth, that's how most things get popular really. Start by telling your friends about it and if they enjoy it they'll probably go tell other friends etc...

I think Ruqqus is bound to grow through word of mouth and you already see the growth happening, heck we just hit 40k users ! Thats totally insane !

post.title: What are some ways to advertise Ruqqus?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
Go to the drop-down menu that appears under your username in the top right corner. Towards the bottom of it, there will be a button called "invite friends" which will copy a signup link to your clipboard. You can then send that to your friends (or anyone really) and convince them to join. If you do, you'll also get a recruiter badge on your profile page.

Also, any time someone on other sites like reddit complains about the censorship and mods there, take that opportunity to get them signed up for Ruqqus too.
body_html:
Go to the drop-down menu that appears under your username in the top right corner. Towards the bottom of it, there will be a button called "invite friends" which will copy a signup link to your clipboard. You can then send that to your friends (or anyone really) and convince them to join. If you do, you'll also get a recruiter badge on your profile page.

Also, any time someone on other sites like reddit complains about the censorship and mods there, take that opportunity to get them signed up for Ruqqus too.

body:
Will do the first suggestion mentioned.

But the second suggestion is somewhat tricky to execute, as just by simply mentioning this site could get the post removed; It is unclear as to how the algorithm works, but it is clear that the algorithm is not how it should work and that the mods are corrupt.
body_html:
Will do the first suggestion mentioned.

But the second suggestion is somewhat tricky to execute, as just by simply mentioning this site could get the post removed; It is unclear as to how the algorithm works, but it is clear that the algorithm is not how it should work and that the mods are corrupt.

author.bio: Let's be honest, we're probably all going to be convicted of wrongthink.
author.bio_html: Let's be honest, we're probably all going to be convicted of wrongthink.

body: I think we have to be careful, this site is still in beta.  I think most here will accept any faults (such as slow page loads, etc) ruqqus currently has, but others may not.  iirc if a page takes 2+ sec to load, the average person leaves.
body_html: I think we have to be careful, this site is still in beta. I think most here will accept any faults (such as slow page loads, etc) ruqqus currently has, but others may not. iirc if a page takes 2+ sec to load, the average person leaves.

post.title: What are some ways to advertise Ruqqus?

body:
Write www.ruqqus.com on bank notes

Actually works, a few of us on an old forum did this and has a bunch of ppl join after getting those notes, pretty cool

post.title: What are some ways to advertise Ruqqus?

body: What really got me is that it's common knowledge that a lot of people from New York went to LA...and people in Hollywood are always trying to get connections...like how are facts, observations, and anecdotes anti-semitic?
body_html: What really got me is that it's common knowledge that a lot of people from New York went to LA...and people in Hollywood are always trying to get connections...like how are facts, observations, and anecdotes anti-semitic?
